metadata.title: CVE-2018-8036 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: In Apache PDFBox 1.8.0 to 1.8.14 and 2.0.0RC1 to 2.0.10, a carefullycrafted (or fuzzed) file can trigger an infinite loop which leads to an outof memory exception in Apache PDFBox's AFMParser.

criterions.comment: libpdfbox-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
